EmailTemplate.name: Closed on Phone - Post NBA Intro Call Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome to Collective!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Opportunity.First_Name__c},
It was a pleasure speaking with you; thanks again for your time and interest in Collective. You can find a summary of our call here (https://content.collective.com/Consultation-Call-Summary), which includes the following:
A high-level overview of the benefits of an S Corp How Collective helps beyond tax savings See how our pricing compares What's included in membership (and what's not) A customized savings calculator tool Additional blog and video resources
Next steps:
Log into your account and complete your kick-off questionnaire!
​​​​​​I will continue to stay in touch; in the meantime, please let me know if you have any questions.
We are thrilled to have you as a member!
Best, {!User.FirstName}
